com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.utils.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton - LibGDX Logging Wrapper providing extended functionality like caller class, method and line number

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOG_DEBUG 
      static int LOG_ERROR 
      static int LOG_INFO 
      static int LOG_NONE
      Gdx log types just to keep all logging functionality in one place

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Wrapper for Gdx.app.setLogLevel simply to keep all logging functionality in one place
        Parameters:
        logLevel - Logging level (int) to set: LOG_NONE: mutes all logging. LOG_DEBUG: logs all messages. LOG_ERROR: logs only error messages. LOG_INFO: logs error and normal messages.
